description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 1d4 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 1d4 type=cold average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The mephit exhales a 15- foot &Reference[cone]{cone} of &Reference[cold]{cold} air. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save dex 10 format=long]], taking [[/damage 2d4 type=cold average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The mephit has a 25 percent chance of summoning 1d4 mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and canâ€™t summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Death Burst. When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a [[/save dex 10 format=long]], taking [[/damage 1d8 type=slashing average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

False Appearance. While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary shard of ice.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Innate Spellcasting.(1/Day). The mephit can innately cast fog cloud, requiring no &Reference[material]{material} components. Its innate spellcasting ability is &Reference[cha]{Charisma}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

You create a 20-foot-radius &Reference[sphere]{sphere} of fog centered on a point within range. The &Reference[sphere]{sphere} spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. It lasts for the duration or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the fog increases by 20 feet for each slot level above 1st.
